body.name: Maxi-Cosi Maxi-Taxi Xt Ultra Compact Car Seat Caddy, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 11 hrs 49 mins
features: Extra-large basket with two zippered storage pockets
body.description: The Maxi-Taxi XT Ultra Compact Car Seat Caddy combines with your current infant car seat to offer a comfy ride on every adventure. It maneuvers like a premium stroller, but its a caddy. So, in case you didnt know, with a caddy, your infant car seat is the actual stroller seat. And thats easier for you Attaches with the greatest of ease With minimal effort, you can attach the infant car seat to the stroller frame all while your baby rests soundly in the car seat. Because naptime is almost as precious as your little one. Just click your car seat into the caddy and be on your way. Unique ultra-compact fold When youre finished with your daily adventures, the Maras unique, multi-directional fold allows you store it upright and more compactly than your typical stroller. This makes it easy to store in the closet or tuck it away in the trunk. Easily maneuver through your day The wheels on the Maxi Taxi take you through your day with ease. An extra-large storage basket gives you a place for larger items, while the two zippered compartments on the front of the basket let you keep smaller items close by. With the Maxi-Taxi XT Ultra Compact Car Seat Caddy, youll be ready for wherever the days journey takes you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Comfy ride on every adventure The Maxi-Taxi XT Ultra Compact Car Seat Caddy combines with your current infant car seat to offer a comfy ride on every adventure. It maneuvers like a premium stroller, but it's a caddy. Moving from car to stroller is simple so you'll be ready for wherever the day's journey takes you.

Premium Details Simple to Handle The Maxi-Taxi XT is a lightweight and easy to maneuver car seat caddy making getting around with baby easier. Add a Car Seat Easily combine the Maxi-Taxi XT with the Coral XP and the Mico Infant Car Seat series for a comfy ride. Compact Fold Featuring a unique multi-directional, ultra compact fold, the Maxi-Taxi XT is easy to store in the closet or trunk. Handy Storage You'll have plenty of room for those daily essentials with the extra-large storage basket and two front zippered pockets.
Maxi-Cosi Maxi-Taxi XT Ultra Compact Car Seat Caddy Product Spotlight Maxi-Cosi We Carry the Future We are in this together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done at a low price. CLEK compatible !
reviews.reviewText: This is by far one of the cheapest baby-carrier bases out there. It's light , relatively sturdy and rolls easily. Even though Maxi-cosy claims it is only compatible with one of their infant carriers , it uses the standard maxi-cosy support arms. I use it with a CLEK baby carrier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits all baby car seats
reviews.reviewText: I like how it was easy to close the stroller by one hand. Also it fit my car seat that didn’t come with a stroller. I couldn’t find one from that same brand and this one came in clutch. It helped me a lot to use through the airport tsa.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what we needed
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use one you get the hang of it. Very stable once car seat is on, although the supports aren't super stable until it's on, which makes it tricky even for two handed use. Folds very easily, but takes up half a small trunk, so be careful about grocery shopping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great stroller, works well with Nuna Pipa
reviews.reviewText: Great product, light and sturdy. Attaches with Nuna Pipa. Just wish they made an easier attachment piece, but besides that it’s great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not for rough terrain
reviews.reviewText: Excellent for navigating in tight stores or restaurants. I wish the cup holder was not removable. It feels safe for the baby when there is weight on the bottom. Stays shut so it stays in my car. Folds tiny. Smaller than a collapsible play yard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits the Nuna Pipa RX lite
reviews.reviewText: Small, compact, and light weight. Exactly what we were looking for as a second stroller to fit our Nuna car seat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t feel sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Overall it is a useful product. I appreciate that I can click in the car seat and not have to wake up my baby. The only issue I have is that it does not feel sturdy. If I try to maneuver certain ways it sort of wobbles. Obviously this is not ideal when it is carrying your newborn baby. So far hasn’t broken or anything, but currently looking to replace this and the car seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my MAXI COSI XP
reviews.reviewText: Exactly how mention on the information provided. Love it!
